SEARCH
Package tradedatacorp.smelter

Interface SmelterStateful<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of a single data instance this smelter processes.
All Superinterfaces:
Smelter<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
FileSmelterStateful<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
OHLCV_BinaryLexicalFileSmelter, OHLCV_BinaryLexicalSmallFileSmelter
public interface SmelterStateful<T> extends Smelter<T>
An extension of Smelter. This instance is intended to maintain data for pre-processing prior to smelting. This will allow pre-processing steps to be applied prior to smelt. The data will be stored in a "crucible" (This could be a Collection, primitive array, external file, or database, etc) The data is not intended to be preserved once processed but that will depend on the implementing class. This interface will have 2 phases: 1. Store pre-processed data into a crucible: 2. prcess the data via smelt().
